question:
You have learned about an international job that is available within the company you currently work for and you want to apply. Write a letter to the hiring manager. In your letter:
 
Say why you are applying for this international position
 
Describe the job you are currently doing for the company
 
Tell him/her why you think you will be good at the job
text: I am writing this letter in connection with an international vacancy which is available within the company in New York .

I heard about the vacant position from my senior  staff. Thus, I want to apply for the above-said job as I want to get better career opportunities. Apart from that, I also wish to shift there because my family is living there and I was living here alone for about 2 years. Therefore, I want to continue my services there.

Currently, I am working for the post of an accountant in the organization and offering my services to it for five years. Here, in this position, I am handling all the financial matters related to accounts as well as dealing with the software built for accounting work. I also endeavour my services as a storekeeper and maintain a record of inventory present in the firm.

I am very good at a professional level and in addition to it, I also have  far better communication skills which are required to work in a foreign nation efficiently and effectively. Moreover, I also completed my academic qualification from that country which will be proved beneficial for the firm as I can better understand the tradition and culture of societies living there.
Therefore, It would be really appreciable if you could consider my application and allow me to pursue my work from there.
Looking forward to hearing a positive reply from your side.
